name: Minimum and Maximum Order Amount for WooCommerce Payment Gateways
author: Raihan

sections.description:
Restrict users from using a specific WooCommerce payment gateway based on minimum or maximum order amounts.
You can easily establish minimum and maximum order amounts for WooCommerce payment gateways.

ðŸ‘‰ Demo Link: Live Preview

With this plugin, you can establish both minimum and maximum order amounts for WooCommerce payment gateways. By defining an order limit for a particular payment gateway, users will be unable to complete an order using that payment method unless the cart total aligns with the specified limit.

This plugin offers the flexibility to set minimum or maximum order amounts for any WooCommerce payment gateway, including options like Cash on Delivery, Check Payment, Direct Bank Transfer, PayPal, Stripe, and more. You can dynamically enable or disable these methods based on whether the total order amount falls below $xxx or exceeds $xxx.

Conditional payment gateways:
If you wish to enable customers to use WooCommerce payment gateways conditionally based on the customer’s order amount, you can easily achieve this with our plugin.

Minimum or Maximum order amount for Cash On Delivery:
If you wish to restrict or allow ‘Cash On Delivery’ payments based on a minimum or maximum order amount, this can be easily achieved using this plugin.

Minimum or Maximum order amount for Paypal:
If you desire to accept payments via ‘PayPal’ and set specific minimum or maximum order amounts, you can easily achieve this using this plugin

Minimum or Maximum order amount for Stripe:
If you wish to accept payments through ‘Stripe’ and set specific minimum or maximum order amounts, you can easily configure it using this plugin.

Minimum or Maximum order amount for Check payment:
If you wish to accept payments via ‘Check’ and set specific minimum or maximum order amounts, you can easily configure it using this plugin.

Minimum or Maximum order amount for Direct bank transfer:
If you wish to accept payments via ‘Bank’ and set specific minimum or maximum order amounts, you can easily configure it using this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the plugin. Upload the unzipped folder to the wp-contents/plugins folder of your WordPress installation.
  2. Active the plugin from the WordPress Plugins administration page.
  3. Admin menu: Go to WooCommerce->Settings->Min/Max Order Amount
